name: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends in a small town uncover a series of supernatural mysteries.

name: The Crown
description: A historical drama about the reign of Queen Elizabeth II.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind plans the biggest heist in recorded history.

name: Bridgerton
description: A romantic drama set in Regency-era London focusing on the powerful Bridgerton family.

name: The Witcher
description: A mutated monster-hunter for hire embarks on perilous adventures.

name: Narcos
description: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent drug cartels.

name: Black Mirror
description: A series of stand-alone dramas that explore tech dystopias.

name: Ozark
description: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks and becomes a money launderer.

name: Lucifer
description: The Devil relocates to Los Angeles and helps the LAPD solve crimes.

name: You
description: A dangerously charming man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is obsessed with.
